alert.note: Alert for Adams; Brown (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 26 at 2:51PM EDT until August 26 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Brown County in southwestern Ohio... Northern Adams County in southwestern Ohio... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 250 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Seaman, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Peebles, Winchester, Seaman, Emerald, May Hill, Serpent Mound, Locust Grove and Smoky Corners. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
